Ash's perspective, as he wonders why his mom is so supportive of his weight gain
111.content:
"Be sure to eat all of your food Ash! This might be the only time you'll get a hot meal in a while!" said Delia Ketchum, mother of Ash Ketchum.

"Don't worry mom, I will!" yelled back her son from the dining room.

Hearing that, Delia was about to go back to the laundry she was doing when she noticed an out-of-place box sticking out of the closet.

'Oh! Ash must've moved it when he was looking for his old cap and forgot to move it back.' she thought as she went over to move it back to its proper place.

As she started to push it in, she noticed that it was some of Ash's old stuff.

"My goodness, I haven't seen some of these things in years! Let's see what's inside." she said with some excitement.

"Let's see. One Mr. Bulbasaur plushie, one squirtle squirt gun, and oh! one charmander husky sized T-shirt."

Of all the memories she missed the most, Ash's plus-sized physique was one the that she missed the most.

When Ash was younger, he was a chubby lad. With a round face, pudgy potbelly, and tiny moobs, Ash was definitely a 'husky' kid. Always, asking for more and always clinging to her, Ash certainly was a huge momma's boy And, because of his huge appetite and lack of exercise, he probably would have stayed that way had Gary Oak not moved here.

When Gary moved, Ash and him immediately became rivals, always trying to outdo each other in everything. School, games, sports. And as Ash got more athletic, he started to become thinner, and started to become more and independent until he dropped the bomb that he wanted to become a pokemon trainer.

When that happened, she knew that she had lost her chubby nine year old forever.

Until today.

When Ash came home, he announced that he was staying for month or more while his companions took care of some personal business.

And, as she looked at him, still eating away, he could see the double chin, the potbelly, the round face smiling. She could see his tiny waddle, bouncing boy breasts, and chubby limbs.

So, she decided that with the month she had with him, she would try as hard as she could to try to get her pudgy son back.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
While this was going on, Ash who was still oblivious to his mother's thoughts, wonder what would've it been like had he still been fat. He clearly remembered being fat and how much he loved it. The feeling of always being full, how fun it was to play with it sometimes, and how much he hated having to lose it all when he was trying to keep up with Gary. And he suddenly decided that he would try to get that back. And why not, he was here for at least a month. Enough time to gain a bit and lose it all again.

And with that thought, he renewed his eating with gusto.

Here's two view points. Pick one, and make sure that Ash still gets fatten up at the end.

11111.content:
With a cheery smile Delia cleared the plates of chicken (all empty now) from the table and looked over to her son who gave a content sigh. "Did you enjoy the chicken hun?"

"Oh yeah it was delicious!" Ash said brightly.

"Im glad to hear it! I have all these new recipes and no one to test them out on"

"Well I've still got some room left if you still feel like cooking"

"Oh that’s wonderful! I’ll be right back with the first course" and with that Delia returned to the kitchen with her Mr.Mime and resumed cooking. After twenty minutes she returned with a huge bowl of macaroni and cheese with bread crumbs on top. Ash's mouth watered at the sight of all the oozing cheese and smelled the heavenly aroma before the bowl could even be placed in front of him. "Well dig in! I'll be in the kitchen if you need anything, ok?" The only response she received was a muffled 'ok' for Ash had started wolfing down the meal as if he hadn’t eaten in years.

Later Delia came back with a 22" deep dish pizza. "When you’re done this pizza will be wa-" she was cut off by the sound of a fork hitting the bottom of a bowl and a loud sigh as Ash leaned back in his chair and rested a hand on his slightly larger stomach which pushed up against his shirt. "It’s good to know my boy has a healthy appetite" she said proudly.

"Well it’s all so good! How can I not eat it all?" Ash said happily.

Delia tilted her head back and with renewed energy said "Well I won’t keep you waiting. I'll be right back" then ran back to the kitchen. The kitchen was a virtual hurricane of ingredients flying and pots and pans clanging as dish after dish were rushed out of the kitchen. Delia and her Mime poured all their energy into their cooking after it became apparent that Ash was inhaling his meals faster than they could cook. Never the less massive mounds of burgers, steaks, buttered mashed potatoes and other filling, fattening meals found their way from the kitchen to the table to Ash’s gullet. The young trainer ate so fast he barely took the time to breathe as mouthful after mouthful of food found its way to his belly which by now was so engorged it made his shirt ride up a good six inches while his poor pants struggled to stay buttoned against the heavy, taught ball of flesh.

“Ooof boy that was good” Ash said as he rubbed his bulging midsection. Delia peeked at her son from the kitchen and thought how meals like this reminded her of times past and brought out the tenth course. A whole apple pie with tons of ice cream on top. Ash eyed the giant desert and struggled to sit up under the weight of his swollen belly.

“I hope this will be enough for you sweetie. I know how you love apple pie so much”

“Thanks Mom” Ash said heavily “Don’t worry I think it will do”. Ash tucked into the pie and with every spoonful, with every swallow Ash’s belly visibly grew and strained against his pants as sweat started to pour from his head. With only one slice remaining Ash felt as if he would explode on the spot if he even looked at it. With determination not to let his Mom down he picked up the slice with one hand and crammed it down his throat. With a mighty gulp the slice landed in his belly and pushed it to its limit as a loud POP was heard. The last slice was the straw that broke the camels back as the button on his pants was blown off, hurtling it across the room like a bullet. The absence of the button allowed his belly to surge forward and push his zipper all the way down.

Ash sat there in a stuffed stupor, his giant beach ball of a belly resting on his lap. With both hands he gently caressed his swollen gut and lightly moaned “Thanks Mom…that was great” he said softly as he drifted off to sleep.

“Anything for my growing boy” Delia said as she covered her son with a blanket and patting his new found girth.

Although after noon, Ash is still wearing only his boxers and t-shirt. The boxers fell snug and his stomach is peeking out up to his belly button. As his mom takes away the empty tin he reclines further, enjoying the sloshing sensation his tummy gives when rubbed - a welcome change from weeks of starving in the wild hunting Pokemon!

He'd been up for several hours already but hadn't yet showered or even moved off the couch yet. All morning had been spent eating! He burps contentedly and sighs. Slowly he begins to doze. Already he hears his mom pulling out pans and pots for dinner. Ash's smile only deepens.

"Just like old times!" he thinks to himself.
"Full up honey?"
"Yeah, Mom, thanks!"
"Such a good boy!"

Ash lays full out on the couch, stomach fully exposed and falls asleep. Within a few hours Mom has finished cooking a meal fit for a Junior Sumo in training! Before she can wake Ash his belly stirs him to life and the hefty boy storms to his place in the dining room and begins stuffing his face like a starved animal.

Mom watches throughout the meal. His rounded tummy bulges out visibly plate by plate. She smiles and helps him load up each plate until the whole meal is in his stomach.

She smiles as she brings him his desert.

As Ash reclines in his bed, later that night, still in his boxers and eating chips he laughs quietly to himself.

"One week and I'm already near as big as I used to be! Wow! No sense in stopping now, right? It feels so good after all. Why should I stop?" He pauses a moment to stuff down a cupcake and guzzle a carton of milk. After a deep belch he continues his reverie. "Man that felt good! Mom sure is baking me alot lately... Oh well, its not like I mind! Heh! Hmm... I wonder how big I'll get by..."

The next day Ash was sitting in the living room, groaning as he rubbed his swollen stomach from the lunch that he had just eaten. It had been decided that he would be on vacation for six months or more earlier that morning.

First Misty had called saying that she had to take a trip with her sisters to go visit some family far away and that she wouldn't be returning for five months or more. Then Brock had called saying that he had to stay home and take care of the gym until his father got back from a trip that would take about six months, if not longer. Neither Misty or Brock had explained, just saying that they had to take care of things with their families for roughly about six months.

Which was fine with Ash. It gave him more time to gain weight. Ash reclined back, still rubbing his belly. He had noticed that morning that none of his shirts could even reach his naval anymore. He would have to have his mom go out and buy him some more shirts.

It was then an idea occurred to Ash. He sat up, groaning as he did so, placing a hand on the bottom of his gut in a futile attempt to stay the pain of moving on his full stomach. He peered into the kitchen where his mother was humming happily as she washed the dishes.

He knew that his mother had to of noticed that he was gaining so much weight. She had to know, especially since she went out and bought him new pants that fit so he wouldn't have to walk around in his boxers, which reminded him. He needed new boxers as well. His underwear was getting a little too tight. Last night when he had bent over to pick up his pants so he could put them in his dirty laundry basket, he had thought that he had heard a rip, but when he had tried to examine his underwear in the mirror, he hadn't seen any such evidence.

Deciding to talk to his mother, Ash got up and walked into the kitchen. Three steps in, Ash noticed the freshly baked cookies sitting on the oven, cooling. Suddenly his stomach let out a tremendous growl and he was instantly next to the oven, stuffing the cookies as fast as he could into his steadily growing gut.

"Oh! Are you still hungry Ash? I've also got some cake in the fridge if you want. It's your favorite, white cake with chocolate frosting." his mom said cajolingly from behind him. Ash turned with his mouth still filled with cookies and his hands full of them and beamed at his mother.

"Thanks mom!" he garbled around the cookies that were crammed into his maw. His mother smiled lovingly at him and turned to get into the fridge while Ash turned back towards the cookies and finished each and every single one of them off.

When he was finished, he turned around to find that his mother had set the cake on the table for him with a fork and an extremely large glass of chocolate milk. He was quickly at the table in the seat the cake was set before, with the fork in his hand. He began to dig into the cake without any further ado, no even bothering to cut him any slices.

Every now and then he would take a couple gulps of milk, but as soon as he replaced the glass, his mother was there, filling it back up. His glass never went empty. When he finished the cake, gulping down his entire glass of milk to wash the remains down, he groaned. He just then realized how much more his stomach felt, how tighter it felt, how good it felt.

"Are you full now, dear?" his mother asked softly. Ash turned to gaze at her, unaware that he had chocolate frosting all over his face with crumbs on his lips and shirt.

"Mom, I know you've noticed how much weight I've gain. I know you have! So, why haven't you said anything?" he asked. His mother fell silent before turning around and pouring herself a cup of coffee and pouring Ash another glass of chocolate milk. She then returned to the table, giving Ash his glass and sitting across from him with her coffee.

"Ash, honey, do you remember when you were little?" she began. Ash nodded.

"Yeah, but wha-"

"Let me continue dear. Do you remember how you were a little heavier than the other boys?" she asked tentatively, never wanting to call her little boy fat.

"Mom, I wasn't a little heavier. I was fat." Ash said bluntly, laughing a little. This caused his mother to smile.

"Yes, you were a little fat. I remember how back then, how you would always cling to me, asking for something to eat. A cookie, a piece of candy, a piece of cake, a piece of pie, a snack, a sandwich. Just little things to show that I loved you and was paying attention. I loved that, Ash. I really did. I loved rubbing your stomach when you got a stomach ache, I love having to buy your clothes that were larger because you had gained a little too much weight for you to fit into your old clothes. I loved those days." she whispered softly. Ash's eyes filled with sadness.

"Mom," he whispered.

"But then Gary Oak moved here. And then you started getting active, losing weight, becoming independent. The little boy who used to sit in the kitchen, watching me, waiting for a cookie wasn't there anymore. The little boy who used to come to me for a belly rub because his tummy hurt wasn't coming to me anymore. The little boy who needed bigger clothes suddenly needed smaller clothes less and less often until he was just buying them on his own. Oh Ash, I miss those days so much." she cried. Ash got up and moved around to his mother, hugging her against his slowly fattening body.

"Oh mom. I miss those days too. That's why I've been gaining so much weight. I've wanted to return back to those days, for just a little bit, at least." confessed Ash as he comforted his mother. She peered up at him, seeing the honesty in his face. She then beamed, tears still pouring out of her eyes.

"Oh Ash, honey. What a pair we are." she murmured, standing up, hugging her somewhat squishy son to her. She then frowned.

"You must be full, though. Lets get you on the couch with a nice warm blanket and maybe a belly rub?" she asked the last part tentatively. Ash smiled.

"A belly rub sounds nice mom." he murmured.

"Then a belly rub it is." she chirped cheerfully, leaving him to the living room and the couch, only disappearing briefly with the warm blanket before she began his belly rub.

“Uh, Misty you realize that your friends are kind of…” Ash tried to put it nicely.

“Don’t worry Ash their weight is not a sensitive subject.” Misty said. She then pointed the man who spoke this is Eric and his fiancée Gina.” Then she sat down next to the other woman and put her hand on her shoulder.” And this Fran her fiancée Justin.”

Ash sat down. “So how do you guys know Misty?”

“We met her about six weeks ago. We all saw the potential in her and we see a lot of potential in you as well.” Eric said.

Misty smiled and said. “Thank you so much.”

“Am I missing something here?” Ash asked.

“You see we are part of a club of sorts. Members of this club are guaranteed success in their ventures as well as long life and happiness.” Gina said.

“And we want you and Misty to join.” Fran said.

“Both of us?” Ash asked.

“There are curtain conditions; first we only offer membership to couples. Now before you say anything being a member has given us certain gifts, like the ability to see the bonds of those who truly love each other whether they know it or not like you and Misty.” Justin said.

“When they told me that they could let me know if you loved me but kept it from yourself I jumped at the chance. Ash please hear them out about what they are offering.” Misty said.

Justin then continued. “You see if you agree to become one of us then the possibility of the couple getting married becomes 100%. You also would have to accept the blessing of our order and that would mean both of you get fat.”

“As fat as you guys?” Ash asked.

“We are still gaining; some of our older members are so big that they can’t walk.” Fran said.

“Yes, we are offering would change you forever and if you accept you can never leave the club. But think of what all of the benefits.” Eric said. “This is a pardon the pun a very big decision that affects you both. If you need to we will give you 24 hour before you both give us your decision.”

“Ash, I love you and we both know you love me too. We do not have to do this if you don’t want to but this could mean that our dreams will come true. 11412.content:
Even in the dark of night, Ash could still make out celebi. In fact, any one could. On a rocky mountain with practically no vegetation there was a twenty square foot landing that was covered in a lush grass field. That kind of thing stood out, mostly because it was a trade mark of celebi. She always made a field grow wherever she landed, legendaries had that kind of power. Ash froze in place, nodding to pikachu to jump down to prepare for an attack. Day break over the horizon had painted the sky a deep orange, perfect scenery, the trainer thought to himself. Now Ash was about to learn a lesson about picking fight with legendary pokemon.

Celebi didn't seem to respond to his presence... that is, until she started laughing. "Hey, what are you laughing at?!" shouted an indignant trainer. She floated up into the air and spun around. It was obvious she was trying to contain her laughter, but she couldn't look at Ash without giggling. She said something in the pokemon language before flying directly at him, "woah uh hey!!" Suddenly he was engulfed by a green field of psychic energy, and pikachu, knowing what that field did, didn't dare interfere with it. It seems that metabolic spray Jessie and James had hit him with had taken heavy effect, in fact, it would only take days for his body to show the new weight, and even rigorous dieting and exercise wouldn't be able to stop his gaining. Of course celebi could tell because she could see Ash's future just by looking at him. In the up coming weeks, he'd eat practically nothing exercise all day and still blimp out. She couldn't help but laugh! It was like her own private sitcom compressed to four seconds of run time! Every time she looked at the trainer, all the legendary pokemon could see was Ash turning into a blob!

She had to get an in person view of Ash Ketchum the Fatty in person, so she decided to do some temporal compression. Ash almost looked like he was being inflated with a garden hose, the gain happened so quickly, and it was only a few seconds before the field released him. He looked to have gained ten pounds, and his new stomach pressed out through his shirt. "Hey!!! What the heck did you do to me!! Get this fat off of me!!!" The celebi couldn't respond, she was laughing to hard. He looked so cute, belly all exposed like that. "Pikachu...uh, Hey!!!" Pikachu was on the ground, rolling over in laughter. Putting a hand to the flab, Ash swelled with indignation. "Change me back!!"

142.content:
"This plan can't fail."

Dawn forced her eyes open, trying to focus on the white washed wall she was currently facing, her vision still blurred at the edges from the chloroform soaked rag that had been pressed tightly over her nose and mouth. She felt dizzy, sick to her stomach, one side freezing cold from where she had been led out against the stone floor, the sound of voices seeming as if they were coming from far away. She moved slightly, as not to draw attention to herself, soon realising her wrists were bound behind her back with a length of material, and so were her ankles. A gag was tied over her mouth, tight enough to dig into her cheeks slightly, effectively stopping her from making any sound above a muffled cry.

"So we just leave her here?"

"That's the plan! Then when the brat comes to save her, he'll be overcome by the effects, and we can take Pikachu right from under his nose. They won't be able to do a single thing about it."

Dawn gasped a little, her eyes opening wider, chasing away the lasting effects of the drug in her vision. She didn't need to recognise those voices to know who they were, only one group of people were intent on getting their hands on Ash's beloved Pikachu, taking down anyone in their way without so much as a second glance. She tried to move, to ease the stiffness in her limbs, shock soaking through her as she finally got the chance to gaze down at herself. Where previously was a flat plane of taut stomach, arching in delicately to emphasise the light flare of her hips, was a stubborn bulge of skin, pushing apart her skin tight top from the waistband of her skirt. She took in a shaky breath, her belly expanding slowly with her frightened breathing, her muddled mind trying to listen to her kidnappers over her increased heart rate.

"Full Incense: An item to be held by a pokemon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that make the holder bloated and slow moving. They'll be helpless to this. Laughter followed, Dawn's heart sinking, able to taste the strong incense curling past her gag and into her very senses, her stomach protruding painfully in proof of it's work. If Ash fell to these effects when he got there, Pikachu would be ripe for the taking.
142.title: Team Rocket have kidnapped Dawn!

1421.content:
Dawn then heard a commotion. She tried to look up to see what was happening, but her view was obscured by some boxes. She did however see too shadows. One was in the shape of a small creature with long ears and a jagged tail. The other was in the shape of a tall boy with a baseball cap on. Dawn squealed to herself in delight: it was Ash and Pikachu! Dawn was going to be saved! After a small celebration to herself, Dawn then realized just how much danger Ash and Pikachu were in. Like Dawn, the trainer and his pokemon would become bloated by Team Rockets Full Incense.

"GIVE BACK DAWN YOU CREEPS!" Ash yelled at the top of lungs.

"We'll let you have your girlfriend back once we get Pikachu!" a female member of Team Rocket (Dawn suspected it was Jessie) retorted.

"Yeah! Besides, we have a trap planned for you!" another member of Team Rocket (Dawn suspected James) added.

"Is that why you guys are wearing gas mas-hey! What's that smell?!" Ash began coughing with a fierce intensity as Team Rocket laughed.

"Dat's de smell of our victory!" a Brooklyn accented Meowth informed. "It's gonna turn ya into a bloated an' slow movin' blob so we's can take Pikachu!"

"*Cough* Pika-*cough*chu! *Cough* Thunderbolt!"

Dawn then heard the familiar sounding explosion of Pikachu's thunderbolt and the sounds of Team Rockets screams of fear and pain. Dawn then heard footsteps coming towards her. She looked up and saw Ash with his arm covering his nose and mouth with Pikachu at his side.

"It's a good thing we found you!"

"Pika Pika!"

They unbound Dawn and ran as fast as they could for the exit.

14211.content:
Ash, Dawn, and Pikachu began to slow down their pace, now about a half mile away from Team Rocket's lair. "Do you think we lost them?" Dawn asked between heavy breaths.

"I think so. That was a powerful attack, so they might not try again for a while." Dawn smiled at this reassurance. She continued huffing and puffing from the long sprint, the bulge that was her belly jiggled slightly with every breath. Dawn did not notice, but Ash sure did. Ash was hypnotized by it. 'Team Rocket said that I would bloat up,' Ash thought 'It must have happened to Dawn, but will it happened to me?' Ash knew that he was exposed to the incense that Team Rocket threatened him with, so when would it happen to him? Ash never was into gaining weight; unless it was a girl...a girl he liked...a girl like Dawn...

"C'mon Dawn, let's keep going. Brock's at the Pokemon Center waiting for us. We can rest up there and continue our journey."

"But what about the affects of that incense? It affected me..." Dawn looked down at her bulging stomach. "And Team Rocket said it might happen to you too! Shouldn't we find a way to reverse the effects?"

"We'll find a way to reverse it at the Center. I promise." Dawn smiled, feeling reassured. Suddenly, all three heard a sound: it did not come from the forest, it did not come from the sky, it came from Dawn and Ash's stomachs. The two blushed at the gurgling sound. "Let's hurry to the Center Dawn so we can get a bite to eat." However, the gurgling sound from their stomachs wasn't just from their hunger, but also from the effects of a certain incense...

143.content:
Ash, Brock and Dawn went to see Ash's mom. She invited them all to stay the night, because the next day they were going to see Brock's dad. So out heroes took a break from their travels, and ate some lovely stew.

"Hey Ash!" Dawn said, "I never knew your mom was such a good cook! We should have come here sooner!"
Brock smiled. "It's a shame none of her talent rubbed off on her son."
Ash scowled at his friend. "I could cook anything I wanted to! In fact, I helped Mom make the dessert!" He smiled smugly at his friends. "Just wait until you taste a piece of my chocolate cake!"
They all finished their stew, dreading what terrors Ash's cooking would do to them. Dawn could almost feel her stomach churn in anticipation of its next meal. They were doomed!
"Here it is, kids!" Mrs. Ketchum brought in a large platter from the kitchen, and on top was...
"Wow!" Exclaimed Dawn, "That's the biggest cake I've ever seen!" And indeed, the cake was huge. There were five large cakes; all piles on top of one another, glued together and completely coated with chocolate frosting. This cake actually looked edible!

"I told you I was a good cook!" Ash said triumphantly. "I'm going to make you eat your words Brock!"
"I'll settle for eating the cake!" Brock exclaimed as he practically dived from his chair to cut himself a slice. Soon, everyone was happily munching on their own piece. There was still a lot left though. Not wanting to let all of this beautiful cake go to waste, Dawn started on her second piece. Everyone else followed suit. Soon every one had another, and then another, and another followed that piece, until everyone had eaten down to the last layer of cake.

"Well I'm stuffed,” said Brock happily as he leaned back in his chair. "Ash, you really ARE a good cook!" Mrs.Ketchum looked worried. "You know kids, that really wasn't a very healthy thing to do. We should have had something nutritious, like carrot cake, or a fruit salad even! You guys will need your strength for tomorrow, and I'm afraid that eating all of that cake will just slow you down."

"Awe, come on Mom! Lighten up! After all, I can hold my cake better than anyone else in the world. I don't have a girl's stomach!"
Dawn's eyes snapped up. "Excuse me? What's wrong with a girl's stomach?"
"Well, everyone knows that girls can't eat as much as boys can." Ash said in a superior voice. "It's common knowledge."
"Oh yeah?" With that, Dawn grabbed another piece of cake from the platter.
"Hey, no fair! You got a head start!" Ash grabbed a slightly larger piece and stuffed it in his mouth with his fork. "Ha!" He said with his mouth full. "I told you we could eat more!"
"In your dreams, skinny boy!" Dawn tried to grab another piece, but Ash got there first. He quickly grabbed the whole cake and started shoving it in his face. Soon there was nothing left of the delicious pastry but a few crumbs and a smudge of frosting.
He started dancing around the room. "Haha! I can eat the most! Boys rule! Hahaha!"

Ash's mom shook her head. "Oh, Ash, I wish you hadn't done that. Now you're going to get sick for sure! You've had more cake than anybody!"
"Ash Ketchum, pokemon master, never gets sick! I'm the master of the cake!" he said, pouring himself a glass of milk. But just then, a funny look came over his face. He suddenly dropped the glass of milk, and ran to the bathroom.

Dawn laughed out loud. I guess even pokemon masters can eat too much.

15133221.content:
Some time after his victory in the Sinnoh League Conference, Ash returned home, hoping to take some time off from adventuring. His friends had all gone their separate ways; Brock returned home to Pewter City, both to reclaim the mantle of Gym Leader from the stewardship of his little brother and to perfect his breeding skills, while Dawn joined up with her childhood friends Lucas, Barry, and Kenny, and trekked to the Battle Zone off Sinnoh's eastern shore, hoping to visit the famous Battle Frontier. Ash didn't mind; after all, his friends had their own lives to attend to, and who was he to interfere? As long as they were happy, he thought, so was he. However, being alone for the first time in quite a while, the young trainer was at a bit of a loss as to what to do next.

Oh, sure, there was always the elusive Isshu Region, which Professor Oak had suggested as his next destination. It was far away, more so than any other place Ash had been, and was host to all kinds of new Pokemon, as well! And, yet...for once the prospect did not excite him, at least not as much as it used to. Truth be told, after so many consecutive years of it, the boy had grown somewhat tired of the seemingly endless cycle of visiting new regions and challenging their Pokemon Leagues. No, for once, he wanted to go somewhere simply as a traveler, taking in the sights and just plain enjoying himself, rather than concentrating on yet another tournament. But, where, he wondered, would he go to do such a thing?

For a while, he set the question aside, electing instead to spend some time at home in Pallet Town with his mother. She certainly didn't mind, being quite happy to have her "baby" home for the first time in Arceus-knows-how-long. Since Gary was away, Ash didn't really have anyone around to interact with save for her, his Pokemon, and the Professor. As a result, he rarely found much to do besides sit around at home, watching TV and eating. And eating. And eating...after a good couple of months of this, the results made themselves quite apparent; where once was a fairly trim stomach, he had developed a rather prominent potbelly, while the rest of his body had thickened in equal measure.

Of course, with Ash being Ash, he didn't even notice his deteriorating figure. Nevertheless, he soon found that he was growing somewhat restless at home, and decided to shove off for his next destination after one more week. He decided on a whim that he would visit Hoenn again, checking up on his old friends May and Max, as well as visiting some of the interesting tourist attractions that he'd missed the first time around. Though he didn't plan on doing any heavy battling while there, he still brought along his Sinnoh team just in case. After saying good-bye to his mother and the Professor, he was off.

Upon arriving in Hoenn, Ash's first stop was Professor Birch's laboratory, whereupon he immediately inquired as to May and Max's whereabouts. Much to his consternation, however, the Professor informed them that the two siblings were still traveling abroad, having set out for Sinnoh immediately after finishing up in Johto ("Great," thought Ash. "As soon as I leave the place, they go there. Just my luck, huh?"). In their place, he found the Professor's son, Brendan; a tall, athletic young man with strikingly white hair and red eyes, he was the same age as Ash himself, and had returned to his homeland after an extended amount of time away, challenging the Leagues of other regions (conveniently explaining his absence when Ash himself challenged the Hoenn League). A longtime friend of May and Max, he had returned to his father's lab in order to receive a mission from him, namely to journey to Hoenn's southwestern oceans in search of the ancient Sky Pillar, where the legendary Rayquaza was said to roost.

Not wanting either boy to be lonely, Birch suggested that they team up and take on his mission together. This was no problem for Ash, who was always willing to make new friends, and had also been unsure of where he wanted to go upon arriving in Hoenn. Brendan, on the other hand, was less enthusiastic, being rather aloof by nature. Nevertheless, his father insisted, and they departed Littleroot together. During their travels, they learned that they actually had quite a bit in common, both of them being talented Trainers with a natural affinity for battle. Even more noticeable, though, was their shared love of food; both boys were incorrigible gluttons, who loved to gorge themselves at any given opportunity.

Needless to say, that's exactly what they did. As the duo made their way across Hoenn, battling any Trainers they ran into and observing the many wild Pokemon, they also stopped at every last buffet along the way and stuffed their faces as much as they could. And, with no one to tell them not to (Misty or Brock for Ash, May and/or his father for Brendan), they were able to continue their feasting completely unabated. Naturally, this caught up with them quite fast; Ash's moderate pudge quickly piled up, and he soon ballooned to about three times the size he started at, gaining a big, bouncy gut that hung over his waist and a couple of new chins, with moobs and flabby limbs to match. In spite of his lack of a head start, his new friend easily reached the same size...

...and yet still, neither one noticed, even as the very act of walking down the Routes became more and more laborious for them. Presently, the two were making their way into Mauville City, no doubt about to head to the Pokemon Centre to hit the breakfast buffet. As they approached...

choices: A pichu with a thunder stone, one of the many gifts to the new chief Pikachu
Ash, wanting his Pikachu back, but he refuses, fee
15222112.content:
Ash's enlarged Pikachu smelled a sweet, smell coming from just outside the city, where it seemed the rest of the tribe of chu's seemed to gather, mostly pikachus and raichus. But in the center of it all was an enormous cake topped with berries, a cake made of several stolen cakes from the city, meshed together.

The chief Raichu, also fattened to enormous obesity, currently even larger than Pikachu, his enrmous gut hanging before him, came to the fattened Pikachu and stated in the native Raichu language, "Welcome to our tribe young brother. We are the Fatchus, a rare tribe of pokémon that honor the heros among us with enormous feasts, and you are now the greatest hero our tribe has ever known. Eat this cake, and take your seat as our chief." He backed away bowing as the new chief marveled at the cake, as he climbed to the top of his initiation. With great gusto he began the greatest feast he had laid eyes on, stuffing his cheeks as if he were a chipmunk, that way he could stuff down the most he could. Within a few minites he had already scarfed down 2 of the 10 tiers. He continued mawing his way back down to the ground, eating the tiers of increasing size, his t stretching and groaning with every bite. But as he started on the last tier, the bloated mous pokèmon was too full to continue. He crawled to his throne, ordering the pichus to feed him the 50 lb final tier.

The 250 lb blobby Pikachu soon finished his meal contently when soon a rustling came from the bushes. What was it?
15222112.title: Stolen Cakes?

choices: Write it here, this Was just so you could see the rest of the option
152221122.title: Feeling this was where he belonged in this world

choices: The pokemon tribe won ( they keep Pikachu)
Ash won ( he takes Pikachu back)
1522211221.content: Just after Pikachu was named chef Ash came storming in wanting to take Pikachu back but the other pokemon go the tribe attackted and...
1522211221.title: Ash want him back.

15222112211.content: After a few minutes of arguing/fighting with one another the tribe won, and Pikachu got to stay. However, he didn't want to have his old friend leave, so Pikachu used his authority as chief and told the others to...
15222112211.title: The pokemon tribe won ( they keep Pikachu)

choices: Pikachu continues drowning his sorrows in food for the next few days.
Pikachu isn't sad the next day, but overeating gave him an eating disorder.
1522212.content:
Pikachu finished his meal and patted his bloated belly. He looked up at the sky and found it was dark. He realized Ash was probably worried about him and had to hurry back. On his scurry out of the forest he was blocked by a group of pokemon not wanting him to leave. He asked them to step aside, but they refused. Pikachu tried to leave another way, but once again he was blocked. This began to irritate Pikachu as he shouted at them to let him leave. This upset and angered the pokemon. In truth they wanted Pikachu to stay and protect them, but they also knew he was a trainer owned Pokemon. This left them with an important task for them to accomplish. While most remained behind to keep Pikachu preoccupied a small group went out take Pikachu's pokeball from Ash. Some of the pokemon were released from trainers before and they knew that if they destroyed the pokeball then Pikachu wouldn't belong to Ash.
In truth they knew that wouldn't be enough to keep Pikachu here so they planned to try and pamper him so much he'd never want to leave. If that didn't work their last ditch plan was to stuff him till he was unable to move and keep him from Ash. After that they'd just have to use a little hypnosis to separate them.
Pikachu was ready to leave forcefully when they heard someone call from above. An Aipom and a few other pokemon were there and in Aipom's tail was Pikachu's pokeball. Pikachu could only watch in horror as he flung it at a rock and see it shatter. Pikachu felt the strange power of the pokeball lift from him, but this just enraged him. He charged up his lightening, but before he could attack a group of pokemon leapt on him and began cramming food into his mouth. Pikachu swallowed a little from the shock, but then zapped them. They flew back, but more pokemon jumped in to take their place. Pikachu kept zapping them, but it there were just too many pokemon to defeat. Plus they were cramming his face with food and already having a full stomach he was already a little tired. Pikachu's lightening began losing power with each shock until he could barely hold off the pokemon for a moment. Finally Pikachu realized the horror that he was out of electricity. His cheeks sparked for a moment then stopped for good. Some of the pokemon tapped Pikachu's cheeks like they were seeing if they were still working. When they were confident they were they backed away from Pikachu and let a few pokemon who knew hypnosis step in. Using that attack all at once Pikachu was fed illusions of Ash being cruel to Pikachu and him smashing Pikachu's pokeball. After that he was misled that the pokemon conforted him and his recent binge was caused by him drowning his sorrow in food. The illusions continued and made Pikachu feel so sad he began munched down food in reality. After a while of hypnosis Pikachu's sadness turned to anger to the pokemons' delight. Pikachu got up with newfound energy.
Meanwhile, Ash was looking for Pikachu when he ran into some more pokemon. He asked them if he knew where Pikachu was, and was answered with a hypnosis attack. He began to see Pikachu acting very rude and selfish to him. That Pikachu pigged out on their food supply and began treating Ash like his slave. The images came coming into his mind until he was just as angry as Pikachu.
The two then ran to find one another and when they did they began yelling at each other confirming what they saw to be true. Their anger grew until they agreed that they were going to part ways there. Ash stormed off without Pikachu. Pikachu on the other hand went back to the other Pokemon and agreed to be their guardian.
After the cheering that Pikachu would stay they all turned in for the night. All of them except Pikachu. Despite being mad as Ash he was still really upset. He began stuffing his face again despite being really full already. Pikachu pigged out on the remaining food before he went to sleep that night.
1522212.title: Imprisoned Guardian

15222121.content:
For the next few days, Pikachu kept trying to eat until he could forget about Ash, but to no avail. All that happened was that he got fatter, lazier, and even more depressed. After a full week of him binging on "Comfort food," he was incredibly huge. The average Pikachu weighed at around 30-35 pounds, but all of his eating caused his weight to skyrocket to 80 pounds.

His arms and legs were as thick as his waist was originally, his fat head peeking out on top of his body along with his triple chins, and his stomach bulging out 2 feet on either side of him, 3 feet out of the front. Even his tail was noticeably softer and duller, sinking a bit into his bigger butt.

Pikachu was a mess. He was constantly sobbing, and stuffing his face with any food within paw's reach. Because of this, every day, Pikachu kept eating until he felt like he'd explode, and then collapsed on the ground and fell asleep. Even though Pikachu was feeling completely horrible about the whole ordeal...
15222121.title: Pikablob

choices: Go back to Pikachu (His followers don't like seeing him upset)
Stay with Ash (See how he holds out)
152221211.content:
The second that Ash was starting to leave the forest, he felt horrible. Several times, he turned around to beg for Pikachu's forgiveness, but stopped himself before he went back in the forest. He went all the way back home to Pallet town to try and forget about Pikachu and their argument. And he did it the same way as Pikachu was, by eating.

Ash walked into his house feeling absolutely miserable about the whole ordeal. His mother decided to try and make him feel better by making him all of his favorite foods, in a huge amount. All that did was make Ash stuff his face for the next couple of days, moping about Pikachu's and his fight. His mother was constantly in the kitchen, trying to keep up with his eating.

Ash felt just as bad as Pikachu about what had happened between them, if not worse. They were friends for as long as either could remember, and one little fight got the both of them to part ways. No wonder why they were both so sad.

Ash had gotten a whole lot huger since he first got home. His gut stuck out a good 3 feet on either side, 4 out in front. Ash's shirt was barely clinging onto his perfectly round gut, just barely covering his chest. His face looks a lot more filled out with his cheeks puffed out, and his neck almost invisible under three chins.

Ash's arms were about three inches thicker than they were before, only moving to shovel more food into his gaping maw. His legs were about 5 inches thicker, and his thighs were touching each other, resulting in him to have to waddle from place to place. Of course, the only places Ash went to were the bathroom, and his bed at the end of the day.

Ash and Pikachu were both very depressed about their fight, and they were both handling it by eating, (very poorly if I may add). The only question now is, what do we do now?
152221211.title: Fat Ash (Bad pun ahoy)

choices: Pikachu tries to decline the food.
1522212111.content:
The pokemon were saddened by Pikachu as they didn't want to see their hero so miserable. They weren't sure at first what to do, but one of the pokemon commented on how Pikachu seemed happiest while he ate so they figured a lot of food would do the trick. With that they began gathering all kinds of foods for Pikachu to munch down. Pikachu smiled at the first few piles of food, but started getting a little worried seeing the piles soon towering over him. Though he had been saddened after losing Ash he had started becoming aware of the shape he was in and started to think about working it off.
Just then a Pichu came in stumbling with a jug of a strange kind of nectar. The pokemon called it happiness nectar since it made them feel happy after taking a sip of it. It was kind of like laughing gas which was what the pokemon didn't realize. Finally, the Pichu tripped and the nectar splashed right into Pikachu's face. At first he wiped it away and spit it out, but before he knew it, he was intoxicated with it. He laughed and chuckled. Sparks shot out of his cheeks and the pokemon thought the food was working. They started handing Pikachu the food to Pikachu who began stuffing himself semi aware of what was happening. Pikachu's recent binges have made his appetite quite big not to mention his current jolly state made stuffing himself silly easy as well. Since the dose of nectar he drank was quite large he was giggling for hours and eating between those laughs. As time passed it soon became dark and all the pokemon, along with Pikachu went to sleep.
The next morning Pikachu awoke to find that he was huge. He could barely remember what he did yesterday, but knew more than ever he had to shed his new weight. He got onto his four paws, but soon collapsed under his weight he had to crawl to move now as his body was simply tremendous. He barely got a few feet when the pokemon arrived around him with food in hand. At that instant Pikachu's stomach grumbled in hunger. Pikachu looked at the food and couldn't understand. He never desired food in such a way before. He wanted to lose the weight, but another part of him wanted to eat.
1522212111.title: Happiness Nectar
